name: Cubes (itch) (noname_tretiak)
description:
The game was made in a few days by a completely unprofessional guy, who recently started game development (me). So, this game is an arcade one, you have to shoot enemies to survive, also you can move, double jump, and dash it'll help you as well

So, there you can check some of the game's OST:

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL1VBlyaFIIA_22qykJlM6-KnKaktGJBhx

I hope the game isn't that bad, and you'll enjoy it. Good luck!
